ive seen this before and believe you me its unbelievable, knocks the shit out of the gilliam version!

Please keep seeding whoever you are.
I am on 82% and I have been downloading for
about a month!!! i will seed for one month after downloading,my hard drive aint big enough for longer.  thx to all ENJOY.
Yikes!  I'm glad you are so patient (I need to check these things more often).  Will seed again ASAP.  :)

I am gratified by the interest that has been shown in this fairly rare film, but I also must note that the torrent has been leeched out at least three times in the relatively short time it has been on TPB.  While I don't mind coming by occasionally to help out, PLEASE think of your fellow downloaders and SEED the torrent after you reach 100%.  Thank you.  :)

is there anybody out here?;)
pls seed!

I have in recent months kept this torrent in my client for weeks at a time because it has leeched out so often. I can't keep doing this; I have other torrents to attend to. Please think of your fellow downloaders and stick around awhile to seed to them!

If all else fails, post a reseed request at SuprBay.
